blog.description: Becca, 20s. USA. Welcome to this multifandom mess! The next three months will mostly be me freaking out over all things Skam and the Magicians. Currently watching: A Discovery of Witches, Poldark, Anne with an E. Other obsessions include: Jane Austen and literally every other period drama under the sun, Stranger Things, Harry Potter, and other random stuff... Enjoy!

tags: sorry this turned into a panicked ramble
i am not ready for friday
summary: So how do you think the party scene will go? For some reason i dont see chloe having a party idk i feel like its gonna be very...
question: So how do you think the party scene will go? For some reason i dont see chloe having a party idk i feel like its gonna be very different and im  s c a r e d
answer: Oh Anon it’s really hard to say! For me at this point it feels like Chloe could be involved with the party or not, but regardless it wouldn’t really take away from the key plot bc she will still be there and lucas will still not want to stay after everything that goes down, whether she’s hosting it or not… but then again David really knows when to hit us with twists so who knows?? All I know is that there will be pain!! I feel like the intimacy of Tuesday’s clip and the confession of the “i saw you on the first day of school” is enough of a subtle change from the OG to pack even more of an emotional punch when lucas feels blindsided at the party. But I too am not ready!! I know we signed up for this angst, but I don’t want it!! In any parallel universe!! Ep. 5 is always the most difficult episode from season 3 for me to watch :(

blog.name: e-demaury
blog.title: The Raccoon And The Hedgehog
blog.description:
Look at this, mecs being mecs

(SKAM France And SKAM OG) -Cait, 16, UK

summary: Dude, I miss OG SKAM so much, but slowly SKAM France is filling the void left by it. SKAM Norway season 3 was one of the best...
body:
Dude, I miss OG SKAM so much, but slowly SKAM France is filling the void left by it. SKAM Norway season 3 was one of the best pieces of television I had ever seen, but yet I always thought (especially when watching the Italian remake) that it could never be matched or that I could enjoy it like it was brand new again.

But with SKAM France, it feels like I’ve never seen the ‘Isak and Even love story’ unfold before - because I’m constantly on edge, despite knowing what’s coming. The changes to the story and character dynamics, although small, really make for a refreshing take on the plot and I can’t wait to see what happens over the next few weeks.

The changes to the story and character dynamics, although small, really make for a refreshing take on the plot and I can’t wait to see what happens over the next few weeks.

summary: The Anchor by Bastille is a song I listen to a lot when I'm more deep into my depression because it's a song about that someone...
question: The Anchor by Bastille is a song I listen to a lot when I'm more deep into my depression because it's a song about that someone that makes the world look a little bit brighter and less scary and that's how I think Eliott sees Lucas. It's not a sob fest but the lyrics speak really loud to me, I don't even know if I'm making sense
answer:
honestly same, the thing here is, i relate to Eliott so much, him and i (™️) are both struggling with similar shit so all these songs are basically making me cry because they speak to me, and i don’t know if it’s the healthiest thing im doing right now by listening to all this sad music but welp. it’s too late

this one is really beautiful btw

summary: Now that I’ve seen a picture of Maxence crying, it’s official guys. I’m not going to survive the season. It’s been fun to know...
body: Now that I’ve seen a picture of Maxence crying, it’s official guys. I’m not going to survive the season. It’s been fun to know you. You’re all invited to my funeral. I asked for Le premier and Combien de Lucas dans l’univers to be played so make sure my family respected my dying wishes. Also, please, make sure “Ton premier mec” is on my gravestone

tags: i hate that post thats like ‘ahh i hope eliott didnt get kicked out of class bc his teacher told him not to doodle lol!!’
im a severe depressive and have bipolar friends and the way some people are talking abt these issues is so ignorant and immature
amf with the shipping the actors are fine with it and even encourage it
like they want u to ship them bc a) they arent homophobic b) theyre obvi really close in real life c) shipping makes shows more popular!!!
i feel like saying dont ship the actors is a reaction that comes from people thinking that the actors have some like
inherit homophobia or toxic masculinity that would make them dislike the concept
but it only goes to far when u punish them for being with other people or try to interfere in their lives
summary: i have to sort by recent in the skam france tag just to see all the stuff i’ve not seen a million times already, but also some...
body:
i have to sort by recent in the skam france tag just to see all the stuff i’ve not seen a million times already, but also some people’s opinions are so trash…

like can u not talk about mental illness if you haven’t experienced it, it’s really upsetting and plus some of the discussion is straight up disinformation

also it’s okay to ship actors as long as you don’t harass them, stop hating on people for thinking they’re cute

blog.name: jebentnietalleen
blog.title: For the ones that feel it the most
blog.description: Hi, I'm Tara. I live in the Netherlands. 30 years old. Decided to delurk now that my skam obsession had returned with a vengeance.

summary:
Okay my dear mecs,
It is almost Wednesday in France and we all fear that angst is gonna come tomorrow.
So to get us through it,...
body:
Okay my dear mecs,

It is almost Wednesday in France and we all fear that angst is gonna come tomorrow.

So to get us through it, I wanted to remind us all of some nice moments to think about during these anxious times:

- Lucas being brave and stepping up to Eliott at the vending machine

- The way Eliott said ‘Lucas’ at the bus stop

- ‘And me? How would you draw me?’

- The look on Lucas’ face when he was sitting on the couch next to Eliott, high out of his mind, admiring his crush

- The piano scene. Always the piano scene

- Smoldering eye contact whilst dancing

- Eliott grabbing Lucas and insisting on walking him home

- ‘Not necessarily a girl’

- ‘You can choose the music’

- 20:27

- 09:17

Here is to many more happy, loving, heartache curing moments to come
